narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: North Metro Community Services Inc. is a Day Training  Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Westminster, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $107.7M in Medicaid payments across 156K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $107.7M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,468 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
